Critical Decentralization Cluster
35C336C337C3LinksMission

The Critical Decentralisation Cluster on the Chaos Communication Congress is an area and grouping of different “assemblies”, which are working together and presenting projects, workshops and a space to critically discuss the future of decentralisation.

List of confirmed assemblies for 37C3

  • Replicant
  • Social Distortion Protocol
  • Namecoin
  • FOSSASIA Open Source community from Asia
  • RIAT independent decentral institute
  • Swiss Cryptoeconomics

We also welcome other assemblies and groups in the categories Privacy & Anonymity, Coded Cultures and Open Hardware.

In the past years the cluster consisted of a recording stage as well as two workshop areas for the assemblies and similar minded groups and projects. Part of the cluster also has been a coffee area from Paralelni Polis, as well as a historic overview of “process artefacts” from the RIAT archive.

Conference Management System FRAB for the Cluster

List of past assemblies at the cluster

  • Apertus AXIOM Open Source Hardware Cinema Cameras
  • Dezentrum think tank for decentralization
  • MNT Reform, Interim & Amiga MNT Open Hardware & Software lab
  • Monero community-driven decentralised and fungible secure digital currency
  • OSHWA Open Source Hardware Association
  • Paraleni Polis Cryptoanarchy, Hackerspace and parallel society

The Critical Decentralisation Cluster on the Chaos Communication Congress (C3) is an area and grouping of different “assemblies”, which are working together and presenting projects, workshops and a space to critically discuss the future of decentralisation.
